title: Penguins cut 18 players; 31 remain on roster, 23 likely to stay
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Sports - Today 
The Penguins planned to fly to Raleigh. N.C., immediately after their 7-2 preseason spanking by Detroit Wednesday night at Consol Energy Cen...
